title: 03/28/22 DPS Hour 3 Kevin Frazier
itunes:title: 03/28/22 DPS Hour 3 Kevin Frazier
description:
Kevin Frazier talks to Dan about the slap from the Oscars heard around the world. Kevin says the key is that they now must find Chris Rock for follow up.
